mission.posting: The federal government has a secret that could be potentially dangerous. We would like you to delete it.

email.subject: Project: Infiltration
email.body:
Be careful with this one. While what we are doing isn't really considered legal, this mission really pushes that boundary. A reliable source of mine has informed me that the federal government is hiding something that could change the world for the worse, something called Project: M. Your mission is to infiltrate the government and scout for any traces of this project. If you find anything related to this "Project: M," DELETE IT IMMEDIATELY. Remember to cover your tracks well. We don't want the government to track you down.
Good luck, -Z3r0
